sentences.english: The final list of six-legged critters has yet to be finalised.
sentences.chinese: 待测序的昆虫名单尚未最后确定。

sentences.english: Positive clones of F gene were identified by PCR and restriction enzyme digestion and then sequenced.
sentences.chinese: 经质粒PCR及酶切鉴定后，对阳性克隆进行测序。

sentences.english: Responsible for the sale of Solid products in certain Area.
sentences.chinese: 负责公司分子与细胞部门测序仪在指定区域的销售。

sentences.english: Cloning and sequencing studies was given to the coding sequence of the MC1R gene.
sentences.chinese: 对MC1R基因编码区序列进行克隆测序研究。

sentences.english: Research method is using three deep-sequencing data sets of C. elegans, G. gallusHomo sapiens.
sentences.chinese: 研究方法是选取了线虫，鸡和人的三套深度测序数据。

sentences.english: Still, others questioned the feasibility of conducting DNA sequencing and typing within a short amount of time.
sentences.chinese: 然而，有人提出在短时间内可进行DNA测序和分型。

sentences.english: The structure of vector was identified by endonuclease analyzing and base sequencing.
sentences.chinese: 通过核酸内切酶酶切分析及测序鉴定载体结构。

sentences.english: In contrast, direct DNA sequencing requires only a single sample from the proband.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，直接测序只需要被检测者的血样。

sentences.english: At CA repeated sequence, the gene sequencing was normal.
sentences.chinese: CA重复序列基因测序未见异常。

sentences.english: The human genome’s sequencing wasn’t formally completed until 2003.
sentences.chinese: 人类基因序列测序工作直到2003年菜正式完成。

sentences.english: The sequence of cloned PDZ1 was identical with that reported in GenBank.
sentences.chinese: PDZ1测序图谱与文献报道完全一致。

sentences.english: Moreover, this model is the most automatic sequencer so far.
sentences.chinese: 同时该型仪器是目前自动化程度最高的测序仪。

sentences.english: The first sequenced individual human genomes belonged to famous geneticists J.
sentences.chinese: 第一批测序的个体人类基因组属于著名的遗传学家J。

sentences.english: We also combined micro arrays and next-generation sequencing data for validation.
sentences.chinese: 我们同时也结合芯片和下一代测序数据作为校验。

sentences.english: Capillary Electrophoresis instruments were replaced with thermocyclers and genomic sequencers.
sentences.chinese: 毛细管电泳仪器被基因组测序取代。

sentences.english: I can see exome sequencing being used for quite awhile.
sentences.chinese: 我敢说外显子组测序将会在很长一段时间内使用。
